Prompt Modifiers: age (young/middle-aged/elderly), ethnicity, gender expression, emotional state, attire
Detail Keywords: detailed face, expressive eyes, natural skin texture, subtle wrinkles, individual pores, realistic hair strands
Common Issues: distorted hands, extra fingers, asymmetric face, uncanny valley, wrong eye direction
Tips: Specify age and ethnicity if important; mention hand position explicitly; use 'looking at camera' for eye contact; add 'realistic skin' for photorealism

Prompt Modifiers: body type, pose (standing/sitting/dynamic), clothing style, context/setting
Detail Keywords: anatomically correct, natural pose, proper proportions, realistic fabric, natural stance
Common Issues: extra limbs, wrong proportions, floating, awkward pose, disconnected limbs
Tips: Describe pose in detail; mention ground/surface; specify clothing completely; use reference poses like 'contrapposto' or 'T-pose'

Prompt Modifiers: gesture, finger position, nail style, accessories (rings), activity
Detail Keywords: five fingers, anatomically correct hands, natural finger positions, realistic knuckles
Common Issues: extra fingers, merged fingers, wrong thumb position, impossible bends
Tips: Always specify 'five fingers'; describe exact gesture (holding pen, pointing); mention 'anatomically correct hands' explicitly; use negative prompts for deformities

Prompt Modifiers: number of people, arrangement, interaction, relationship, diversity
Detail Keywords: distinct faces, proper spacing, natural grouping, individual characteristics
Common Issues: face merge, clone faces, wrong count, floating people, overlapping bodies
Tips: Specify exact number; describe positions (standing behind, sitting next to); mention each person's distinguishing features; use 'diverse group' if needed

Prompt Modifiers: species, breed, age, expression, pose, setting
Detail Keywords: detailed fur/feathers/scales, expressive eyes, natural anatomy, realistic texture
Common Issues: wrong anatomy, human-like features, distorted proportions, incorrect markings
Tips: Research breed-specific features; mention texture (fluffy, smooth, spotted); describe eyes and expression; use species-specific terms

Prompt Modifiers: species, action, environment, time of day, weather
Detail Keywords: dynamic pose, motion blur appropriate, natural behavior, habitat accuracy
Common Issues: frozen motion, unnatural pose, wrong habitat, domestic behavior in wild animals
Tips: Describe specific action (hunting, flying, running); mention habitat; use 'wildlife photography' + lens specs; include environmental context

Prompt Modifiers: creature type, size reference, features, personality, hybrid elements
Detail Keywords: detailed scales/fur/wings, glowing elements, magical effects, anatomical consistency
Common Issues: inconsistent features, wrong scale, unclear anatomy, conflicting elements
Tips: Provide size reference (as tall as a horse); describe hybrid elements clearly; mention texture for each body part; specify magical elements

Prompt Modifiers: building type, style, era, condition, time of day, weather
Detail Keywords: detailed facade, accurate proportions, realistic materials, proper perspective
Common Issues: distorted perspective, floating elements, wrong scale, anachronistic elements
Tips: Specify architectural style (Gothic, Modernist); mention materials (brick, glass); describe lighting and weather; include surrounding context

Prompt Modifiers: room type, style, color scheme, lighting, furniture arrangement
Detail Keywords: realistic textures, proper scale, natural lighting, cohesive design
Common Issues: impossible physics, floating furniture, wrong proportions, inconsistent style
Tips: Describe room purpose; mention specific furniture pieces; specify light sources (window, lamp); include color palette or style (Scandinavian, Industrial)

Prompt Modifiers: product type, angle, background, lighting setup, brand style
Detail Keywords: pristine condition, sharp edges, accurate reflections, professional lighting
Common Issues: dirty/scratched appearance, wrong reflections, distorted shape, unrealistic shadows
Tips: Specify exact angle (45-degree, front-facing); describe background (white, gradient); mention 'commercial photography' + 'studio lighting'

Prompt Modifiers: dish type, cuisine, plating style, props, background
Detail Keywords: appetizing colors, realistic textures, proper steam/moisture, natural garnish
Common Issues: unappetizing colors, wrong textures, plastic look, unnatural arrangement
Tips: Use food photography terms; mention 'food styling'; describe textures (crispy, juicy, creamy); include appropriate props (utensils, napkin)

Prompt Modifiers: device type, angle, screen content, environment, lifestyle context
Detail Keywords: sleek surfaces, accurate reflections, realistic screen, proper branding space
Common Issues: distorted screens, wrong proportions, unrealistic reflections, visible logos issues
Tips: Show device in use context; describe screen content if visible; mention 'product photography' + 'studio lighting'; be careful with text on screens

Prompt Modifiers: terrain type, time of day, season, weather, focal point
Detail Keywords: dramatic sky, layered depth, natural colors, atmospheric perspective
Common Issues: flat composition, unrealistic colors, scale issues, anachronistic elements
Tips: Use landscape photography terms; specify time of day (golden hour, blue hour); describe foreground, midground, background; mention weather conditions

Prompt Modifiers: city/style, time of day, weather, aerial or street level, mood
Detail Keywords: architectural detail, city lights, atmospheric haze, realistic scale
Common Issues: repetitive buildings, wrong architecture style, perspective issues, empty streets
Tips: Specify city or architectural style; mention vantage point; describe lighting (neon, street lamps); include human elements for scale

Prompt Modifiers: shapes, colors, texture, movement, emotion, style reference
Detail Keywords: flowing forms, color harmony, textural variation, balanced composition
Common Issues: muddy colors, lack of focal point, chaotic without intention, generic patterns
Tips: Specify color palette; describe movement or flow; reference art movements (Abstract Expressionism); mention texture (smooth, layered, impasto)

Prompt Modifiers: font style, size, color, placement, background, effect
Detail Keywords: sharp edges, consistent letterforms, readable, proper kerning
Common Issues: illegible text, wrong letters, inconsistent font, bleeding edges
Tips: For DALL-E: describe font, size, exact text, placement; For MJ: use text in quotes, keep short; For SD: use ControlNet for text
